dict.acceptation: 用具，装备；索具；阻挡；阻截队员；
着手处理；[橄榄球]擒住并摔倒（一名对方球员）；给（马）配上挽具；

sent.orig: He started 73 of 75 games at right tackle and left tackle.
sent.trans: 他为海盗出战75场，73次首发担任左截锋和右截锋。

sent.orig: Alzheimer Scotland has called for an additional ￡150 million to tackle the dementia epidemic.
sent.trans: 苏格兰阿尔茨海默（协会）已要求增加1.5亿英镑，以解决痴呆症疫情。

sent.orig: I will certainly be back again to tackle the course.
sent.trans: 我一定会再次回来解决这门课程。

sent.orig: If Bill is late again, I'll tackle him about it.
sent.trans: 如果比尔再迟到的话，我就得和他谈谈了。

sent.orig: Identify the core random matrix question that needs to be solved to tackle the generalization.
sent.trans: 识别随机矩阵核心问题，解决它们以处理一般性问题。
